betafeatures-auto-enroll: Basim suor ka maal beta la bam bɔɔd si'em
betafeatures-auto-enroll-help: Beta yɛlsieba tun'e mɔr tiasieba banɛ ka fʋ pʋ mɔri ba ti'irɛ, alazug {{GENDER:|fʋ}} na kpɛn'ɛsi linɛ fʋ mɛŋ.
betafeatures-desc: Kɛl ka tʋmʋtʋm la bas suor bɛɛ o da bas suori tis bʋmbanɛ pʋ si'al ye ba bɛ wiki saŋa linɛ nara
betafeatures-section-desc: Kpɛla{{PLURAL:$1|ka bʋmpaal|banɛ an bʋmpaala sieba}} ka ti mɔr pʋtɛn'ɛr ti ti tis {{SITENAME}}. Fa' m bɛlimnɛ mɔɔm ka maki {{PLURAL:$1|li|ba}} ka tisi ti fʋ pʋtɛn'ɛr ka ti maligim maali {{PLURAL:$1|li|ba}} ka li yinɛ fʋn tisi ti labasia la ni na.
